name: Space in Fire
description:
Space in Fire is a 3rd person space shooting game. You will drive a spaceship and keep survival among the stars.

You will control your spaceship in 6 degree of freedom - forward/backward, left/right, up/down. It take a while to get used to it. My tip is try to practice your pilot skill before click the start button.

In the game, just shoot any drones who run after your ship and collect any boxes as quickly as possible, they will not awaiting forever.

In short, please enjoy it and thanks your time and patience for my works.
